Tittel: Prediction of Stock Market Volatility Utilizing Sentiment from News and Social Media Texts : A study on the practical implementation of sentiment analysis and deep learning models for predicting day-ahead volatility

stocks in the S&P500 index. The purpose is to find out if sentiment can improve the forecast
